message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it's a great deal and will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much money as possible. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal. I'm willing to come down a bit to $110. This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
